thread.title: Young Fournette impersonator performs Heisman dance party during Saturday's game
thread.title_full: Young Fournette impersonator performs Heisman dance party during Saturday's game

title: Young Fournette impersonator performs Heisman dance party during Saturday's game
text:
Updated Oct 12, 2015 at 7:40p ET 
Who said college football can't include dancing? 
During LSU's 45-25 victory over South Carolina on Saturday, a youngster in the stands made his presence known with an extravagant and passionate display of dancing. Shout out to this young Tiger fan. You stole the show with those moves! #DancingMachine https://t.co/IjFhykwC0J â€” LSU Football (@LSUfball) October 11, 2015 
The choreography included the boy (dressed as Leonard Fournette ) utilizing the Heisman pose in spectacular fashion. Once the music hit, the Fournette impersonator displayed his ardent support of the Tigers with his own personal dance party. 
One has to wonder, does LSU's star running back possess these dance moves? MORE NEWS: Want stories delivered to you? Sign up for our College Football newsletters.
